'''Nightwatch Contract''' is a [[Quest Item]] found in the [[Immernachtreich Keep]]. A total of five Nightwatch Contracts can be found.

Upon the completion of the {{Quest|Immernachtreich Apokalypse (Part 3)}}, the Nightwatch Contracts can be given to the [[Nachtraben Airlines]] ravens on [[Twinning Isle/2.8|Twinning Isle]] to unlock several [[Wind Currents]] and a [[Common Chest]].
